Thus objective investigate effect malt extract vs. sucrose : 1 . 3-hour change concentration glucose insulin 2 . 3-hour change subjective appetite sensation ( Visual Analogue Scales , VAS score ) 3 . DOC.brief_title: The Acute Effect Malt Extract Versus Sucrose Response Glucose Insulin , Subjective Appetite Sensations ad Libitum Energy Intake
